Pre-Game Insights: The Twins' hitters will face starter Nick Martinez, with Kyle Farmer, Carlos Santana, Manuel Margot, Jose Miranda, Byron Buxton, and Willi Castro having previous at-bats against him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be held at Target Field in Minneapolis, Minnesota, with a 7:10 p.m. ET start time and broadcast on MLB Network.
Others: Nick Martinez has pitched in 39 games this season with an ERA of 3.46 and 7.2 strikeouts per nine innings, with an opponent batting average of.249.
